verses.text: 問安奉　神旨意作基督耶穌使徒的保羅，和提摩太弟兄，

words.note: Lit. 'ask about peace'.
Often used in formal or religious contexts.
Refers to the Christian God; often capitalized in translations.

verses.text: 寫信給在歌羅西的聖徒，和在基督裡忠心的弟兄。願恩惠平安從我們的父　神臨到你們。

words.note: Often used as a locative suffix after a noun or pronoun.
Often translated as 'grace' in a theological sense.
Here refers to God the Father.
Refers to the Christian God; often capitalized in translations.

verses.text: 為歌羅西信徒感謝　神我們為你們祈禱的時候，常常感謝　神我們主耶穌基督的父，

words.note: Refers to the Christian God; often capitalized in translations.
Forms a noun phrase 'when we pray'.
Reduplicated adverb for emphasis.
Refers to the Christian God; often capitalized in translations.
Refers to Christ as Lord.
Here refers to God the Father.

verses.text: 因為聽見你們在基督耶穌裡的信心，和對眾聖徒的愛心。

words.note: V-C compound, implying successful hearing.
Often used as a locative suffix after a noun or pronoun.
Often used to mean 'the general public' or 'all of a group'.
Often refers to compassion or agape love.

verses.text: 這都是由於那給你們存在天上的盼望，這盼望是你們從前在福音真理的道上聽過的。

words.note: Here implies 'stored up' or 'reserved'.
Lit. 'blessed news'.
Can refer to a path, method, or philosophical/religious truth.
Locative particle indicating 'on' or 'in the context of'.
The particle '過' indicates past experience.

verses.text: 這福音傳到你們那裡，也傳到全世界；你們聽了福音，因著真理確實認識了　神的恩典之後，這福音就在你們中間不斷地結果和增長，在全世界也是一樣。

words.note: Lit. 'blessed news'
Implies deeper understanding than just knowing facts.
The space '　' before 神 is a mark of reverence in some Bibles.

verses.text: 這福音也就是你們從我們親愛的、一同作僕人（「僕人」或譯「執事」）的以巴弗那裡學到的。他為你們作了基督忠心的僕役，

words.note: A church office, usually for service.
Refers to a person's location/origin.

verses.text: 也把你們在聖靈裡的愛心告訴了我們。
保羅的祈禱因此，我們從聽見的那天起，就不停地為你們禱告祈求，願你們藉著一切屬靈的智慧和悟性，可以充分明白　神的旨意，

words.note: The space '　' before 神 is a mark of reverence in some Bibles.

verses.text: 使你們行事為人對得起主，凡事蒙他喜悅；在一切善事上多結果子，更加認識神；

words.definition: be worthy of, live up to

words.note: Often implies receiving something positive from a superior.
結果 is 'bear fruit', 兒子 means 'fruit'.

verses.text: 依照他榮耀的大能得著一切能力，帶著喜樂的心，凡事忍耐寬容；

words.note: Refers to divine glory in this context.
Often refers to God's omnipotence.
Often denotes spiritual or divine joy.

verses.text: 並且感謝父，他使你們有資格分享聖徒在光明中的基業。

words.note: Refers to God the Father.
Lit. 'holy disciples', referring to believers.
Used after a noun to denote 'in/among (it)'.
Often refers to ancestral property or divine heritage.

verses.text: 他救我們脫離了黑暗的權勢，把我們遷入他愛子的國裡。

words.note: Refers to Jesus Christ.

verses.text: 我們在愛子裡蒙了救贖，罪得赦免。

words.note: Refers to Jesus Christ.
Used after a noun to denote 'in/inside (it)'.
'蒙' implies receiving something often divine or undeserved.
Lit. 'save and redeem'.
Here, '得' indicates something is gained or a result is achieved (sins are forgiven).
Lit. 'pardon and excuse'.

verses.text: 基督在萬有之上這愛子是那看不見的　神的形象，是首先的，在一切被造的之上。

words.note: Lit. 'ten thousand things', signifying all of creation.
A more formal or classical way to say 'above'.
Refers to Jesus Christ.
Lit. 'cannot be seen'.
In theology, refers to Christ as preeminent or firstborn over creation.
Can function as an adjective or refer to created beings/things.

verses.text: 因為天上地上的萬有：看得見的和看不見的，無論是坐王位的，或是作主的，或是執政的，或是掌權的，都是本著他造的；萬有都是藉著他，又是為著他而造的。

words.note: Refers to the celestial realm.
Refers to the terrestrial realm.
Lit. 'ten thousand existences/things'.
Lit. 'ten thousand existences/things'.

verses.text: 他在萬有之先；萬有也一同靠著他而存在。

words.note: Lit. 'ten thousand existences/things'.
Classical construction: '之' marks possession/relation.
Lit. 'ten thousand existences/things'.

verses.text: 他是身體的頭，這身體就是教會。他是元始，是死人中首先復生的，好讓他在凡事上居首位；

words.note: Refers to Christ as the first cause or source.
Implies supremacy and priority.

verses.text: 因為　神樂意使所有的豐盛都住在愛子裡面，

words.note: Refers to Jesus Christ.

verses.text: 並且藉著他在十字架上所流的血成就了和平，使萬有，無論是地上天上的，都藉著他與　神和好了。

words.note: Lit. 'ten-character frame', referring to the shape.
Nominalizes the following verb/clause.
Often symbolic for life or sacrifice in the Bible.
Lit. 'ten thousand existences/things'.
Refers to the terrestrial realm.
Refers to the celestial realm.
Specific theological meaning of reconciliation.

verses.text: 雖然你們從前也是和　神隔絕，心思上與他為敵，行為邪惡，

words.note: Indicates sphere or aspect; 'on the mind level'.

verses.text: 但現今　神在愛子的肉身上，藉著他的死，使你們與　神和好了，為了要把你們這些聖潔、無瑕疵、無可指摘的人，呈獻在他面前。

words.note: Refers to Jesus Christ.
Combines with '為' to form '為了' (in order to).
Lit. 'cannot be pointed at and faulted'.

verses.text: 只是你們要常存信心，根基穩固，不受動搖偏離福音的盼望。這福音你們聽過了，也傳給了天下萬民；我保羅也作了這福音的僕役。

words.note: Often introduces a qualification or condition.
Lit. 'blessed news'.
Ancient Chinese concept referring to the whole world.

verses.text: 竭力傳揚　神的奧祕現在我為你們受苦，我覺得喜樂；為了基督的身體，就是為了教會，我要在自己的肉身上，補滿基督苦難的不足。

words.note: Refers to completing what is lacking.

verses.text: 我照著　神為你們而賜給我的管家職分，作了教會的僕役，要把　神的道，就是歷世歷代隱藏的奧祕，傳得完備。現在這奧祕已經向他的眾聖徒顯明了。

words.note: Connects an action to its purpose or result.
Can refer to God's word, doctrine, or the 'way' of salvation.

words.definition: to preach so as to achieve
words.note: Structure 'verb + 得 + adjective/adverb' indicates result.

verses.text: 神願意使他們知道這奧祕在外族人中有多麼榮耀的豐盛，這奧祕就是基督在你們裡面成了榮耀的盼望。

words.note: Lit. 'profound secret'. Often refers to divine mysteries.
Refers to non-Jewish people, often translated as 'Gentiles'.
Refers to divine glory or splendor.
Lit. 'profound secret'. Often refers to divine mysteries.
Refers to divine glory or splendor.

verses.text: 我們傳揚他，是用各樣的智慧，勸戒各人，教導各人，為了要使各人在基督裡得到完全。

words.note: Lit. 'transmit and raise', meaning to make widely known.
In a spiritual context, often means 'spiritual maturity' or 'blamelessness'.

verses.text: 我也為了這事勞苦，按著他用大能在我心中運行的動力，竭力奮鬥。

words.note: Often implies strenuous effort and hardship.
